Aurora.Mooseheart, Illinois: Mooseheart is an unincorporated community and a home for children in Kane County, Illinois, United States run by the Loyal Order of Moose and is located near Aurora. Also known as City of Children, a short documentary film City of Children (1949), written by John Nesbitt, was in the Passing Parade. Established in 1913, they celebrated their centennial in 2013.
